entry.title: Ukraine Clamps Down on Orthodox Church Linked to Moscow
entry.content: Ukraineâ€™s government moved to curb the activities of the Orthodox Christian denomination historically linked to Moscow, aiming to cut off the most important remaining source of Russian cultural and religious influence in the country.

entry.title: China Turns to Well-Worn Playbook to Keep Protesters Off Streets
entry.content: Authorities move to address the demands of protesters by signaling an easing of strict Covid-19 policies and by deploying police to the sites of protests and hunting down activists.
